Deficiency Narrative: All staff records reviewed did not have a pre-employment screening assessment.
Correction Narrative: The staff will call and check all screening prior to staff being offered a position. All the staffs that were missing documentation were completed on 08/22/2025.

Deficiency Narrative: All children's records reviewed did not have a place to document child's religion and the child's religion was not documented.
Correction Narrative: The staff created a new intake sheet to ensure all requirement documentations are present in the child's file. The staff will conduct monthly audits to ensure all children file have a required documentation and files are true and accurate.

Correction Narrative: The staff will call and check all screening prior to staff being offered a position. All the staffs that were missing documentation were completed on 08/22/2025.

Deficiency Narrative: One child in care was hospitalized, and no documentation was provided as to why child was not administered medication as prescribed by health-care provider.
Correction Narrative: Staff was prescribing proper prescriptions by a medical provider and started a new medication log. Staff discounted all unused and expired medications properly. Staff conducts daily audits to ensure all medication is properly administered.
